alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 12:20AM EDT until August 25 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Mahoning County in northeastern Ohio... Southeastern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Stark County in northeastern Ohio... Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1219 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mantua to Lodi, moving southeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Wooster, Salem, Ravenna, Columbiana, Cuyahoga Falls, Boardman, Massillon, Kent, Barberton, Green, Alliance, Hudson, Wadsworth, Tallmadge, North Canton, Streetsboro, Louisville and Orrville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Holmes; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Wayne
